understanding.C: Create an evidence-only PR that triggers ask_inbox_producer to auto-commit codex/inbox/ask_<ts>.json. The Runner (dry-run) should detect it, write reports/codex/codex_runs/<id>/run.log, and move the JSON into codex/inbox/_done/. DoD: PR branch contains codex/inbox/ask_<ts>.json; run.log exists; codex/inbox/_done/ask_<ts>.json exists. Artifact: the run.log path; optional: any evidence PR link created by the runner.

acceptance: Pass if: (1) The PR branch contains codex/inbox/ask_<ts>.json (auto-committed by ask_inbox_producer), (2) reports/codex/codex_runs/<id>/run.log exists, and (3) codex/inbox/_done/ask_<ts>.json exists. Provide the run.log path as evidence and, if present, the runner-opened evidence PR URL.
